"Wh-what....*huff* what the hell do these...*Haah* *Hahh* blobs want to make us so fat for?!" Ada bemoaned. She still wasn't wholly over the loss of her figure yet. On the other hand, she felt a strange urging in the back of her mind, memories of the euphoria and pleasure that came from swallowing that first blob. Ada felt her breathing become more ragged as her pupils dilated and she felt a blush on her face.

The Asian woman shook her head back and forth, her chins swaying as she did. Now wasn't the time for that! At best, she needed to see if Clare, Sherry and her couldn't find shelter before she and Redfield covered the whole city in their fat...
12321111121222112222221.title: A blob a day keeps the zombies away?

As the ladies relax Sherry wonders if the blobs have given up the chase?
123211111212221122222211.content:
'I really must be losing it...but I could have sworn that "alpha" blob just put on a pair of shades! Considering it's night-fall already, what a douche! Can't believe I just said that about a blob...that's sentient no less, then again may have just been a terror-born hallucination...'

As Claire, busy with her thoughts, continued to stampede away from the doughy mob Sherry took the opportunity to pop on out now that she was able to do so again. She was just about to warn Ada that one of the jelly beasts was catching up to her when she noticed the plus ton woman cut, well more like stumble, around a corner the bull-like rush of the blob appearing to be be it's own undoing as it spattered onto an abandon bus spraying chunks of it's force all across the automobile and the area nearby!

Sherry sighed hoping that would mark the end of one less monster to deal with...unfortunately the poor girl was wrong as the supposed fallen beast began to retake it's original shape as it regenerated together piece by piece! It seemed to her that the only sure way of "killing" them was to...*gulp* eat them...

She felt she should inform Claire about how the blob healed itself when she came to spot a warehouse nearby! The healing info would have to wait right now the tree of them needed any form of sanctuary!

"Claire there's a warehouse just ahead!"

The massive brunette heard the child's outburst trusting in Sherry's eyes since she was preoccupied at the moment, for a few reasons.

"Up ahead?"

"Yeah just keep going can't miss it." explained Sherry as she pointed in the appropriate direction.

"Alright...Ada follow me! Sherry's told me of a warehouse up ahead...hopefully we can lose them by diving in there."

Sherry seem to notice that despite her becoming more adjusted to her grand size Claire couldn't continue on indefinitely. Her breathing was increasing at a rapid pace and she could already see the flushed expression along with the beads of sweat flying in multiple directions. Her enormous guardian was tiring, she assumed so was Ada who had even less time to adjust to her weight, they needed to get in there now!

Lucky for the hurried up trio they were able to outrun their pursuers, at least to the possible entry point anyway.

"Sherry hunny get the door! Quickly there's no time!" ordered Claire as she and Ada served as look-outs, both still semi-exhausted from the rush from moments ago.

The girl did as told sliding down Claire's vast bosom and belly then ran the rest of the way she made it to the entrance a few seconds later but soon a new problem arose, the door that had been slid shut refused to open!

Try as she might, especially given that she was still a child, Sherry simply could not get the door to allow any sort of entry into the building! Precious time was burning away as were arms from all the force of strength she was using, strength that at her young age her body simply didn't have enough of.

Exhausted she called out to Claire informing her of their new problem.

"Great just what we needed..."

"In ways expected."

Were the bloated ladies respectful responses. To make matters worse they could still hear the sounds of the blob pack closing in on them.

"Shit. At best we have a hundred and eighty seconds before they descend on top of us."

Claire really wishing Ada didn't have to be so direct and grim.

"Sherry step aside sweetie. We're getting in there one way or another!."

Sherry again did as told as Claire requested for Ada's assistance, for once the Asian woman didn't argue as she waddled on over.

"If you have any sort of plan best to make use of it now."

Claire purposely ignored the usual snark-filled tone instead explaining that together they should be able to lift the door off the ground. Ada seem to agree as the two heavy-set ladies got into position counting down before they started to lift.

The rolling door was being amazingly difficult even for the two of them, although neither had yet to fully recover from earlier, their faces flushing over as drops of sweat ran down their vast forms.

Just as it seem they had reached their breaking point the door finally gave up much to their silent rejoicing.

"Sherry get in now! Don't worry we'll be right in."

With an understanding nod the little girl made her way inside waiting for the two blobby women to join her.

Claire then instructed for Ada to enter while she held the door open. She was unsure if the woman would protest again but it seemed she'd never get to know as they overheard the sound of the blob pack getting even closer. If Ada was indeed correct they were about to swarmed by them!

Feeling rather humiliated due to it taking a bit of squeezing to get through, warning the child and bigger brunette to not allow a single laugh to escape their lips, Ada at last got through.

Time however was running short as the pack had finally spotted them, more so Claire's grand form, the woman could almost feel that glasses-wearing blob from before leering at her gigantic backside.

"Redfield get in here, now!"

Ada's outburst serving to clear and refocus her thoughts, the blobs were coming and she was officially out of time so Claire did the only thing she could think of...

"Make way I'm coming in!"

With the two of them out of the way Claire surprised both Ada and Sherry by literally rolling herself inside!

She had picked up from Ada's attempt that simply walking in would be troublesome, if not impossible due to her greater size, so why not act like a soccer ball sailing into a goalie's net. Not the most respectable entrances but at least she was inside with Ada and Sherry and that's all that really mattered at the moment.

Afterwards they allowed the door to shut behind them if they had struggled to get in hopefully that meant it would keep those monster blobs out.

Thoroughly exhausted from the entire ordeal Claire and Ada sat down, the ground rumbling a tad bit as they did so simultaneously, Sherry volunteering to be something of a lookout for the two of them.

"Okay but stay close sweetie I don't want you wandering off again." Claire stated with a smile at the little girl's sudden act of bravery.
123211111212221122222211.title: As the saying goes, any port in the storm!

AMBUSH! The blobs found another way in!
1232111112122211222222112.content:
Ada wanted to sit down. She was panting hard, sweating bullets and even with the thick fat on her chest in the form of her impressive bosom, she could feel her heart pounding against it. With a thick hand, she wiped at her brow. She wanted to sit down, but with her size and her massive rear, she would need Clare to lift her up off the floor again after.

Ada blushed at the thought. She was still a bit hung up on when she and Clare collided into each other, 10,500 combined pounds of blubber hitting the pavement hard. She was surprised the two of them didn't fall down into a sewer from that impact and she was able to see an impression of Clare's massive, peach like ass embedded into the tarmac.

Ada only felt her blush strengthen. Why in the hell did she bother to notice the shape of Clare's ass, especially after they almost got hounded down by a pack of those blobs! This wasn't the time for crap like that, she needed to think for now. It seemed she wouldn't be able to find Birkin's research and honestly...after all she had gone through so far she was ready to just give up and run off. To hell with all this double agent crap, she just wanted to get her advance and kick back somewhere like Rio.

Ada looked over with her steely eyes as Clare looked down at Sherry. The little girl groaned as she pulled at the latch on a large storage container, yanking it open as multiple prepackaged foods poured out, almost covering the poor girl in a gastronomical avalanche had she not stepped back.

"Well we at least have food for as long as we hole up here...and there's water pumps in here if we get thirsty." Clare observed as she surveyed the warehouse floor, which was sort of like a small living room for someone of her proportions, as well as significantly less head room.

"No offense but...still pretty full after swallowing a massive blob not five minutes ago..." Ada snarked as she glared up at Clare's fat face with a vacant and unamused stare, which looked sort of like a puffy, oblong pumpkin, even more so as the ponytailed brunette puffed up her cheeks. Sherry, having not eaten in a little while, tore open a package of chocolate chip cookies and started to dig in happily.

Clare laughed a bit and even Ada couldn't help but looses up a bit and even smile as she watched Sherry, in spite of all the hell she went through, lighten the mood almost instantly. She was still a child, through and through. However, she still likely lost her parents and on top of that, she would probably need serious therapy after all was said and done.

Ada frowned as she found herself thinking a bit too much maybe about the logic of the moment, but mostly at the thought Sherry was very likely orphaned. Clare was busy making small talk with Sherry to lighten the mood as neither noticed Ada's mind wandering as she looked down at her body. Maybe once she was out of here...

Clare looked over at Ada, her mouth stained a bit with crumbs from potato chips Sherry had shared with her. Now that she had time to think, she found her mind wandering as she found herself staring at her bulbous body. The look of her fat flowing even in the dim light of the...wait, what was she thinking?! Maybe she was still a bit tipsy from being fed so much blob, yeah that was it!

Sherry herself stole a glance at the shutter door to the warehouse, which stood in firmly for now, but what if the blobs came again? They were quite quiet for now when they seemed to come at the three of them so aggressively earlier, it was weird. The actual peace they had for now felt bittersweet as they relaxed.

"Uhm...why have they been so quiet?" Sherry spoke up nervously as she voiced her concern.

Clare and Ada looked at each other before staring at the door as well. They had to admit, Sherry had a point. On top of how single-minded the blobs seemed to be in fattening up the two women, that one leader blob seemed much more intelligent. And those sunglasses must have meant it was much more annoying than the others or at least a huge douche. Seriously, who wore sunglasses at night?

"Well...if one breaks down I guess I could eat it..." Ada said, groaning afterwards. "I mean they aren't killing us...just making us fat and annoying the crap out of us."

Clare was about to object, but then she realized...Ada had a point! These things didn't hurt them, kill them, they were less threatening then the run of the mill zombies, even! if one did slither in somehow, all either of the mammoth beauties had to do was swallow up the gelatinous beast and that would be it. Sure, they'd be tons heavier but still!

That was only a minor problem though. There was still mutants, zombies and lord knows what else out there! They needed a plan, a way to get out of here and find any survivors they could...
1232111112122211222222112.title: Calm before the storm

choices: Ada must first deal with the blob blocking her from getting back to Claire!
Claire rushes to help but is blocked by the other blobs that have made it in!
12321111121222112222221122.content:
Sherry continued to finish off the box of cookies in her small arms as Claire excused herself wanting to speak further with Ada perhaps. She silently watched Claire make her way over toward the "smaller" woman the massive brunette pulling out a box of a cupcakes from within one of her folds of fat as a gift offering of sorts. Ada merely staring at her as if she were half-crazed while Claire sighed as she shot her an amusing yet awkward grin.

Busy with her snack Sherry couldn't quite make out the conversation the two were having with one another but it sounded to her as if Claire was pressing on Ada to eat something so she'd get her strength back while Ada repeated that she was still quite full not to mention that Claire had literally pull the tasty treats out of her multi-ton bulk!

In a way it amused Sherry to see the two ladies argue with one another seeing as it served as a way to lighten the mood somewhat.

As she popped another cookie into her mouth Sherry was rather surprised at the speed-eating but she assumed it was due to the whole "trying to stay alive" factor from the past few hours. That said she still thought over the pack of blobs that were seemingly determined to hunt them all down.

Ada had brought up a good point that if any of the monstrosities got in either she or Claire could simply devour the blob whole but Sherry had seen first hand what eating one too many of those things could do to someone's figure. Claire bloated to an inhuman amount while Ada roughly over a ton with just one blob entering her system.

But it seemed that eating them really was the only option the ladies has as she recalled that one blob that had healed itself right up after it had splattered all across the pavement during their chase from earlier. She still hadn't told Claire or Ada about that.

Having finished up the box Sherry placed it safely aside and was just about to tell the massive ladies about what she had seen earlier when her hearing picked up on a faint dripping. Was one of the pumps leaking? The place did seem to be abandoned in a hurry given the amount of food left behind.

She glanced over at Claire and Ada, it seem to her that her enormous guardian had at last gotten Ada to eat a cupcake or two, and decided not to bother them it was just a minor leak after all so following the sound it didn't take long for her to come across the source...

Turns out it wasn't any of the pumps leaking this seem to be coming from one of the vents high above on the ceiling. A gooey substance staining the warehouse floor that looked oddly familiar but the lack of proper lighting made it a tad bit difficult for the girl to know for sure.

She was just about to reach for the sizable puddle when she heard a yell come from Ada nearly frightening the hell out of her in the process!

"Get away from that kid!"

Frozen still Sherry was surprised when she felt herself be lifted off the ground and into one of Ada's thick comfy arms! The woman had amazed the child, Claire, and even herself with her stunning speed. She honestly hadn't expected to move that fast and that quickly what with a literal ton of blubber weighting her down but she had and for that all three ladies were thankful.

Not a moment later Sherry realized she had been standing right on a danger zone as one of the blobs from earlier came crashing down from the ceiling the trio surprised at the monster's durability to withstand such a fall.

"W...waaaahhhh!" Sherry squealed like the child she rightfully was as the sound of multiple air-vents broke apart signaling that the blobs had found a way inside!

Terrified at the situation suddenly going sideways Ada instructed for Sherry to calm herself until she could get her back to Claire. It came as something of a surprise to her that she was willing to do whatever need be to keep Sherry from becoming a victim to this gelatinous fattening creatures. She'd deny it later but maybe she was developing a soft side for the innocent little girl in her arms.

123211111212221122222211221.content:
Claire backed away, trying her best to make sure the three blobs in front of her didn't trap her in a corner. The last thing she needed was her thick, rolling back stuck against a wall while she was being force fattened. On the other side of the warehouse, Ada could only look on along with Sherry, still clutched in her puffy arms like a teeny tiny doll as a fourth blob blocked them off from going to help their ally, forming its mass into long gelatinous, tentacle-like arms. The shutter door was still closed tight and while Ada considered ramming it down with her blubbery mass, she shook her head. If it were that easy, the blobs could have done the same thing, couldn't they? Or were they choosing to be crafty, here?

Even if she could, Ada would not deny this: She owed Claire one for helping her and allowing her to tag along and escape the whole of the horde. The blob slithered forwards, reaching towards Ada's body with it's long arms stretching out like rubber as it seemed to try and snatch Sherry! The little blond girl screeched in fear before she felt herself suddenly plunged in between the deep, uncannily soft safety of Ada's cleavage, between her hefty, plush breasts, before the black haired woman grabbed at the blob's arm and pulled it forward, a defiant and fiery gaze in her eyes.

"Leave her alone." Ada said with tranquil fury as she opened her mouth wide, the blob burbling inside, a sign of fear perhaps as it was forcefully plunged into Ada's mouth and down her throat. Ada slurped up the massive blob of slime, gulping it down as the massive being passed her lips, her body billowing forth with new flab and lard. Ada softly cooed as her hands pressed against her billowing belly. She felt embarrassed that even when feeding on these things willingly, they possessed something inside that caused a euphoric rush of pleasure inside of her. She was lucky Sherry was too young to know about this sort of thing, as she merely though Ada was getting fired up over being victorious over her opponent as she sucked up what was left all at once, her body surging outwards even faster with fat.

Claire tried to use this chance while the other three blobs weren't looking to find some way out or something to use, when one of her fat-swollen feet stumbled over some canisters. The brunette rolled one out in front of her so she could see past her grand form what it was and her eyes widened with hope when she read the label; "Liquid Nitrogen."

"UUUUURRRRRRPP!!" A raucous and uncouth belch passed Ada's lips after swallowing up that huge blob. Her form quivered, the newly added bulk, Ada's weight climbing up to a very hearty 4,800lbs. She glared at the massive blobs, who seemed to shake almost in fear, causing Ada to smirk and give a confident snort.

"That's right. I'm not running from any one of you. Sorry boys, but I feel like you wore out your welcome." Ada wiped her mouth with the back of her hand as she slowly lumbered towards the blobs, as they almost seemed to recede a bit out of fear before Claire suddenly screamed, "SURPRISE!"

As Ada looked up, Clare threw three cansiters of Liquid Nitrogen, one in each blob. Next, as quick as she could manage, she reached into one of her upper folds and pulled out her pistol, which she had deemed useless until this point, and shot through the blobs at each canister. Their contents released within each blob, slowly but surely freezing each one in place like living ice sculptures as they were frozen solid before they could try and counter.

Ada sighed, feeling herself relax as Sherry climbed her way out from her protector's cleavage slowly. Claire waddled around the new ice sculptures sitting in front of them as she smirked at Ada.

"Gotta admit, that was pretty badass of you." Claire chuckled, the mountainous brunette quivering slighly from her own laughter. Ada allowed a single light chuckle to escape her own lips as she looked up at Clare, finding eye contact easier thanks to the added bulk she had obtained.

"I could say the same for you, after that stunt." Ada mused as she waddled over, tapping her thick, cuddly fingers against one of the frozen blobs. It was firm, but not frozen solid, kind of like a literal popsicle. Still feeling a sort of lingering pleasure sensation after gulping down that last blob, the black haired woman could also feel an urge to eat these three as well.

"Guess we may as well break them if they're frozen like this. Better then leaving then to thaw." Clare muttered as she thought aloud to herself, looking around for a sledgehammer or something she could use, when she nearly smacked herself as she remembered she was over four tons of pure fat which could allow her to easily crush these frozen monsters right here, right now!

*Grrrwwwwll~*

...On the other hand, it was only natural that a big girl like Claire would have a big appetite...

The vast amount of snacks found here were fine but were obviously more filling to someone of Sherry's tiny size then to her own massive self, same as Ada really more so now having taken a fresh hit in the weight department.

Truthfully a part of her didn't want to admit to willingly wanting to eat another blob especially after she had done so much earlier to save Sherry and that caused to her to weight a near handful of tons! Was she really ready to add even more record-breaking weight onto herself?

Her stomach seemingly answering for her as she felt a deep rumble build from within and exit outward, her numerous folds better resembling waves out in the ocean as her tremendous form shook from the hunger.

"Okay despite what I said earlier...maybe just maybe we just up and eat them all together."

Silence surrounded the lady trio, Sherry slightly confused as to why Claire would want to eat more of those things, Ada inwardly agreeing with the brunette's decision her own stomach while silent craved for more of those fattening blobs, while Claire wished this awkward moment could just end.

"It would be best, after all we don't know if they can properly heal from any sort of injuries." stated Ada, poker-face as ever, and much to Claire's silent rejoice now that the awkwardness from before had passed.

"Um...actually..." Sherry politely interrupted pausing for a second until Claire told her it was perfectly okay for her to continue.

"How do we even, er...get out of here?" Claire asked, smiling nervously as a drop of sweat flowed down the back of her head. Ada and Sherry looked around on their own, wondering. Sherry points out the cookie stand and ice cream shop
12321111121222112222221122112112121212.content:
"So it would seem..." Ada answered, her fat face flushed with heat her breathing rapid in succession, her massive breasts colliding with her chins as she took in breath after breath. Claire was no different the bigger of the two equally exhausted after their frantic dash to escape their fattening foes.

"A mall..." Claire mentioned through her breathes as she took note of their surroundings. "Any other day it'd be shopping time...but..."

"Best use it for shelter." Ada stated. The two of them needed rest anyhow so might as well take advantage of their possible good fortune...

Later after having forced not to mention squeezing through one of the entrances the blubbery ladies found themselves in a short hallway leading to what was apparently the food court. It was all but abandon however much like the rest of the mall at least from what they could tell. Not wanting to risk her safety Claire instructed Sherry to remain hidden inside the haven of the brunette's bountiful breasts.

However the little girl soon popped her head out when the enormous woman's belly grumbled with pains of hunger!

"I think your belly's trying to tell you something, Claire." Sherry stated with an amusing and equally adorable expression.

It was true she nor Ada had eaten in a while not to mention with their recent getaway it was little wonder that they were hungry...well actually she was she wasn't sure...

Ada shot a glare that seem to read of "not a word" as she overheard the other woman's globe of a belly growl in hunger. So Claire ultimately decided to keep any comments on the matter to herself.

"Let's see what we can find." Ada remarked as coolly as possible attempting to quickly change the subject.

"Sure thing." Answered Claire following the other blob woman's lead.
12321111121222112222221122112112121212.title: Let's go to the mall

Ada is...happy where she is.
123211111212221122222211221121121212122.content:
"What to est though...?" Ada murmured as she thought to herself. "I doubt we have the resources to cook anything ourselves. I'm honestly surprised we're fitting inside as is..."

Ada looked up at the ceiling, standing tall above. This mall itself was huge, like a palace.

"Oh, oh, oh!" Sherry cried out as she started pointing at something before her.

"What is it?" Clair asked curiously.

"Heh, look! There's an ice cream shop ahead! And over there is...ohh, they have cookies there!"

Ada sighed as she approaced Clair as close as the halls would allow, getting a good look at Sherry.

"I don't think sugar is the best thing for us to eat in a survival scenario." Ada stated with blatant skepticism. "That and I'd hope to do as much as I can to avoid any extra weight..." She muttered that last part to herself quietly.

"Well, I don't think we have any other choice for food..." Clair offered her rebuttal as another hungry growl eminated from the doughy mass of flesh she called her belly, a cry Ada's stomach joined in on.

"And it's highly possible that others cleaned out the grocery store before we even thought of coming here..." Ada considered, her hopes of potentially shedding pounds dashed for the moment.

Sherry had to walk into each store since, obviously, the absurd masses of her protectors made it impossible for them. She carted out serving trays of ice cream and whole boxes of chocolate chip cookies. The two fed on sweet ice cream and cookies as Sherry delivered it, feeling relief at having something to fill the burning pits in their stomachs.

Their bodies quivered and rippled slightly with each swallowed mouthful of food as more delicate pounds were added upon their bodies almost instantly, anything eaten going directly to calories and thus, more body fat. Ada felt herself squish up against Clair's own creamy blubber as the became larger and larger, a blush glowing on her adorably puffed up cheeks.
123211111212221122222211221121121212122.title: Sweet treats

Someone appears from behind a register, gun drawn, and her name's...Jill!
1232111112122211222222112211211212121221.content:
For a moment Ada attempted to shut down her brief blush after having taking notice of her accidental brush up with Claire's equally tremendous self. She wasn't known for adorable or compassion snark and bitchiness yes but for some reason teaming with the blob of a brunette and innocent little Sherry was causing a slight change in her general attitude. Just a slight mind you.

Still she had to keep herself and her emotions in control if they were going to continue survive and as she watched the child happily play with handfuls of Claire's soft blubber she figured now was as best a time to excuse herself and scope out any other available shop. After all there had to be something around here other then sweets...

Perhaps thanks to a bit of luck or maybe her companions were far too busy in their own little world neither suspected that she had made her leave, quite amazing really given her sizable girth. Nonetheless she continued to glance around as she made her way, literally bumping not to mention pushing aside anything not bolted down, further into a deeper section of the food court.

Eventually to her honest surprise she came across a burger joint obviously abandoned yet not without complete power she assumed any visible lights the "small" group had come across were being powered by an emergency generator so it didn't surprise her to see a flicker or two of light come from the fast food place.

Her hefty belly grumbling almost in a way to remind her that she had momentarily given up on the sweets yet still desired some sort of nourishment so with an audible sigh, her vast form jiggling like no tomorrow, she wobbled her way on over once again her hopes of losing any of this incredible weight of hers fading as her belly rumbled.

"Alright I heard you the first time."

She ignored the sense of lunacy born from arguing with her own dome of a stomach instead concentrating on reaching the front counter just a few more steps to go until...at last she reached her destination!

She could spot the kitchen not too far off behind the counter and registers no doubt the storage room was somewhere further in the background. Shouldn't be too hard to find once she was done searching over the kitchen however only then did an important little thought come to mind...how exactly was she going to get in to search the place?

A simple task made difficult due to her blob-like size. She cursed inwardly as she went over idea after idea.
1232111112122211222222112211211212121221.title: Ada needs some time to herself

choices: Jill Valentine is thin, who'da thunk?
Seems Jill is a hefty half ton, The blobs got her too?
1232111112122211222222112211211212121221.content:
"Damn..." Ada muttered to herself as she looked down at her eclipsing belly, this simple movement causing her multiple chins to press against her bosom, sending her body into a minor fit of jiggling. "...I wish that would happen less..." Ada said to herself as she noticed her form moving about.

While fast food may not have been the best alternative nutritionally to ice cream and cookies, she was never one for sweets. She was a grown woman after all. Well...now she was a really grown woman, but that was beside the point.

"Maybe I can send Sherry in? Ahh, but I don't even know if there may be some straggling zombies left inside..." Ada thought, muttering her thoughts quietly to herself, hoping that it would help her formulate an idea. "It would be nice if I could get in...maybe I could even get her some of those cheesy kid's toys they give away..." A smirk appeared on Ada's puffy face as she imagined Sherry forgetting the horror that was around them for a moment to to play with some cheap plastic figures. "Kids have it easy...so simple, so innocent..."

Ada paused. She realized that wasn't true for Sherry anymore. A child of six and already she was trapped in the hellscape Raccoon City had become, teeming with biological experiments, from the risen corpses of the dead feeding on the flesh of the living to mutated beasts to these amorphous blobs who seemed oddly eager to feed themselves to any passing women.

Ada paused again. That last one sounded veeery out of place compared to the first two.

"For all I know, they're carriers of some strain of another experimental gene...then again, Umbrella operates on some strange rules. Like using emblems and medals in place of vaults and old fashion locks and keys...I wonder if the bathrooms are locked and unlocked with an Umbrella emblem..."

Ada forgot her strange tangent as she noticed something glimmering in what the faint lighting shining in the restaurant.

"Who's there?!" Ada commanded, instinctively reaching into her folds to try and find her own gun.

"You're...not one of those blobs?" The voice asked, clearly female.

"Well I guess thanks to them, I'm a blob in a different way..." Ada muttered begrudgingly. "Just calm down...you don't give me any trouble and I'll return favor." Ada didn't want to start any fights, moreso out of fear the exchange of loud gunfire could attract unwanted attention.

"Right...right...my name's Jill Valentine. I'm a member, or I guess an ex-member, of the Raccoon City S.T.A.R.S. team."

S.T.A.R.S.? That sounded familiar...

"Wait...you said S.T.A.R.S.? Ma'am, did you work alongside a Chris Redfield?" Ada asked.

"He's my partner. I don't know what happened to him, but I assume he made it to safety or he's still here trying to help as many people as he can." Jill replied.

"I see...well, I'm sure my companion will be happy to know. ...Why don't you stick with us a bit?"

"What?"

"With three guns, the odds will be better stacked in our favor. Plus...we're escorting a child, a six-year-old, to safety so I...we would appreciate it." Ada said, her tone softening a bit as she thought of the added safety for Sherry.

"I suppose that's fair...I'll admit, I'll need your help too with getting out of here, before we're found."

Ada nodded as she took some slow waddling steps. She watched Jill move out from the shadows, getting a better look at her.
1232111112122211222222112211211212121221.title: Jill's Sandwiches

choices: Ada's stomach suddenly interrupts so Jill offers to fetch her something to eat
They hear a rumbling nearby! They are not alone...but is it friend or foe?
1232111112122211222222112211211212121221.content:
Upon closer inspection Ada was rather taken back at the brunette's form mostly because the woman was...thin!

Or rather more to the point Valentine was of decent weight with a right amount of curves along with a hint of strength in her muscles. Given her occupation in law-enforcement it made sense that the woman was well in shape even if in retrospect there was no training system on the planet that could properly train one for the kind of insanity befalling Raccoon City.

That said for a moment Ada wondered over the thought that perhaps Jill had somehow been able to avoid any sort of confrontation with those fattening blobs.

"You stated you too required a form of help, what exactly were you doing in here or there rather, Valentine?" Ada asked normally she'd stroke the end of her chin after such a question only now there was much more...chin so to speak and she'd rather not send her body into yet another jiggling spree.

"Call me, Jill, as for your question well I've been using this place as a safe-house due to the vastness of the building. Easy to find your way in and easy enough to keep yourself safe in case something follows you in."

That last part caught her attention alright, there was more to this and she was eager to hear it.

"I'll be honest for the past few hours I've been chased around by a horrid monstrosity, a walking apocalypse, a living bio weapon...whatever you want to call it. Point being that it has it's sights on me and I've been doing everything I can to stay one step ahead of it."

While remaining silent deep within Ada realized that compared to Jill she and Claire had gotten off easy, well ignoring the metric tons of weight at least they weren't being hunted by some kind of nightmarish beast. All the more reason to team up as it would seem.

"You sure you lost it?"

"Yeah but that thing has an uncanny ability at finding me. So it will be back." Jill stated her tone dipped in seriousness very fitting an officer such as her.

"Then we have to reunite with my other companions." Ada responded her own vocal tone matching that of the brunette's her hunger from before seemingly disappearing at least for the time being anyway.

"Agreed you stated you had a child with you rest assured I won't let any harm come to her. By the way I didn't catch your name?"

"That's because I didn't exactly throw it. It's Ada Wong just so you know."

The massive woman responded with some of her typical behavior a way of lightening the mood as well as being rather surprised at how calm the brunette was handling the sight of her. It was almost as if she wasn't the size of a pack of elephants to Jill or maybe Valentine just had one hell of a poker face much like herself from time to time.

"Well met then, Ada."

It was brief but she was fast enough to catch the flash of a smile on the smaller woman's lips. It was hard to say but perhaps Jill was just happy to have some human company regardless of size.
1232111112122211222222112211211212121221.title: Out running a monster makes for some good cardio

choices: It's just Clare, looking for more food.
Nemesis busts down the wall! Could Ada's bulk aid Jill?
1232111112122211222222112211211212121221.content:
Ada herself felt a bit relieved she had found a woman who didn't look so huge she could span several streets with her immense hips, like she and Clare did at the moment. She smiled a bit herself as she looked down, pondering.

"How have you been keeping yourself away from the blobs anyway?"

"Luck, I suppose." Jill answered earnestly. "Plus I can't afford to let myself get slowed by anything with that thing chasing me. I need to be ready no matter what."

"Maybe if you did succumb to a fattening, you could use your new massive ass to defend yourself." Ada teased in a rare show of humor. Jill herself was a bit bemused, smirking at the comment, but mostly because of just how ridiculous that sounded. Fending off a genetically engineered monster by slamming into it with a big fat ass...then again, she could say for sure that stranger things had happened. She remembered walking into the RCPD and finding a few cops who had been zombified during a surprise party and were still shuffling about in a conga line. Even in death, those souls truly knew how to party.

The thought was interrupted by a low rumbling sound echoing through the spacious mall. Jill snapped to attention, looking around quickly as she held fast onto her gun.

"What was that?" Ada asked. She knew it couldn't have been her even if she was still hungry.

"Something that doesn't bode well..." Jill responded as she looked around. The mall was still somewhat dark inside, making it a bit hard to see in the distance. Soon, stomping sounds accompanied the low rumble, leaving Jill suspicious.

Damn...did he find me again? She thought. I could try to lose him in here. I have a feel for the layout of the building and I could lure him away from Ada's company. He wants me, so I don't have to worry about risking the life of that child.

Ada fished through the folds of her belly, finding her pistol stuffed somewhere in the upper shelves. She may have put on several tons within the course of this night, but as long as she could manage to aim past her immense bosom, she would have no trouble giving Jill supporting fire.

Speaking of Claire Ada yet again asked why Sherry was out on her own? Where was Claire?

"Oh she's coming she's just finishing off a snack said she was still hungry. If you heard any noises I'm pretty sure that was Claire."

Sherry explained her youthful smile beaming brightly a sharp contrast to the grim-looking atmosphere around them.

At least that explained what they had heard earlier.

"Oh there she is! Hey Claire say hi to our new friend!" Sherry yelled out as she ran up to the approaching blob of a woman.

However as Claire at last made her way over Ada noticed that the child had failed to mention one thing...

Clare had grown hugely in the short time Ada left looking for more food. The ponytailed brunette just barely sat within the corridor where she was relaxing, said corridor being pretty absudly spacious as is. Ada felt her mouth open a bit at the sight of Clare's wobbling immensity, looking at how her buttocks wobbled and catching a good look at her even larger breasts.

Jill herself resolved that any weight gain in the past that had ever worried her was nothung compared to these two.

"O-oh, hey guys..." Clare said with a weak smile.

"Clare, are you alright?" Ada asked, worried that perhaps her partner ate something bad.

"Just feeling...*phew* stuffed is all..." Clare sighed. "That and...I think I got an ice cream headache..."

Clare breathed in sharply through clenched teeth, groaning a bit as she rubbed at her temples.

"It'll pass." Ada assured her with an amused smile. Jill hoped she never became a new victom to the blobs. Ever. Forever

Ada on the other hand was happy knowing that even with such gluttony to go with their girth, she and Clare could still set limits on how much they ate. For a while, she actually feared the blobs would turn them into mindless eating machines...

"Sorry Clare, your headache needs to clear up fast." Ada said stoically.

"Wh-whaaat?"

"We need to keep mpving, else we'll get caught easier. Doubly so, for our new friend, Ms. Jill Valentine."

Jill nodded.

"It's true. Umbrella deployed one of its monsters and it's been chasing me for a while. We need to find a way out of the city, now."

"B-but, wait! What about my brother, Chris?! Your partner!" Clare protested.

"Chris...? Oh, so you're his baby sister." Jill smiled.

"You don't have to say it like that..."

"Sorry." Jill chuckled."But last I checkec, he and Barry found a chopper that could get people out and to safety."

"Too bad that chopper doesn't come with harnesses, I bet." Ada dryly stated. Clare shot her a look, finding the comment rather disconcerting.

"I may agree on that end..." Jill sighed. "But we could find other methods I bet. Maybe..."

"Maybe Umbrella left behind some toys we could use." Ada mused.

"Right...but we need to get out of here..." Saif Jill. "We need to survive."
1232111112122211222222112211211212121221.title: Even blobby women have limits.

Ada reluctantly agrees to track down Leon, better to stay together then apart
1232111112122211222222112211211212121221.content:
Even with all the bulk surrounding her Jill's kin eyesight could still make out the worried expression on the face of her old partner's formerly "little" sister. There was nothing little anymore about the younger lady Redfield and as much as she hoped to never become another victim of those fattening blobs she also hoped that somehow Claire and Ada could after this nightmare was over shed off the literal tonnage forced upon them on this night.

"Claire...may I?" Jill asked curious if she could refer to the massive brunette by her first name rather then her last, Claire agreed to the request her chins almost comically colliding with her stunning bust. Much like before when she had gotten a better glance at the highly fattened women Jill realized vow that any complaints she may have made in the past about her rather sizable breasts in the past was nothing to what Claire had to deal with now. It was almost amazing to think she a full-grown woman could stuff herself inside such a storage of cleavage...

That last thought nearly rocked her world so she rightfully placed aside and focused on learning what was bothering Claire although it didn't take her much to guess what it was.

"Claire I'm sure Chris is fine. Your brother is one of the best I have ever had the pleasure of working with. He will survive this and you'll see him again, you just wait and see."

The blob-like brunette seem to understand as she nodded yet again triggering the same reaction from her doughy form just as before. Jill was able to ignore the sight as best she could the second time around though.

"Good because if we're going to survive ourselves we need you completely focused. I'm sorry if that sounds harsh but the truth often is."

"Don't worry I get it."

Truthfully Claire did in fact understand the meaning behind the smaller woman's words, words that dripped in such a serious tone there was no mistake Jill was an expert at her craft much like her own brother and perhaps a skilled leader was something their makeshift group needed at the moment.

"Excellent then we shouldn't waste any more time. The last thing we need is to be found out by not only those crazed fattening blobs but as well by the bio-beast chasing our newest companion."

Ada brought up some good points the blobs were seemingly obsessed with making them bigger and bigger and she sure as hell didn't like the sound of whatever it was that was chasing Jill around. She hoped it would stay as far away from them as possible.

However something or rather someone soon came to mind!

"Leon!"

"Who?" questioned Jill understandably unfamiliar with the name brought up in a rush by Claire.

"He's...a friend and a fellow survivor! We can't leave him to die in this city!"

"One you don't know if he's even alive anymore two did you forget that we need to get out of this place as soon as possible." Ada stated coldly as she cut right into the conversation.

"He has to be...I just know it. He's alive and we can't leave him."

"Going back will slow down and set back our own escape. In situations like this you have to accept there will be casualties you can't save everyone!"

"I'm not trying to save everyone, I'm trying to save Leon! I told you already Ada I don't leave people behind if they can be saved then I'm going to save them with or without you! It's something I learned from Chris and I know damn well he'd do the same."

Jill could easily make out that things were going sideways quickly perhaps she should step in but not before she felt Sherry pull at her skirt. She slapped one a reassuring smile to ease the little girl's nerves muttering that everything would be alright.

"That selfless nature of yours is going to be the end of us!" Ada yelled in her cold tone as she shot a finger out in Claire's direction.

"I don't understand how it can be seen as an injustice to help people in need. I thought you had changed and by traveling with me and Sherry had seen that the world doesn't need to revolve around number one or the darkest of outcomes." Claire argued hoping she could talk some sense into the disagreeing woman before the conversation completely got out of hand.
1232111112122211222222112211211212121221.title: Claire's pacifism vs Ada's pessimism

choices: The blobs finally found them! Time to take action?
They find a ham radio and learn a nuke was fired at the city! Time is limited!
1232111112122211222222112211211212121221.content:
Ada sighed deeply, looking at Clare with a cool fixated gaze. The ponytailed brunette frowned a bit as she wondered just what the Asian woman was going to say.

"...Fine. You win again." She said in a calm tone, which surprised Clare a bit. "If you want to risk us all for his sake, that's fine. I want to believe he can take care of himself, but maybe he can appreciate an extra hand."

Clare was a bit surprised to hear that. At first she thought Ada had fallen back on her previous, callous nature, but it seemed she was simply being optimistic in her own way, believing Leon could make his own way.

"...and...I would have preferred seeing us all safe as soon as possible." Ada admitted, albeit in an oddly bashful manner. If Clare and Sherry didn't know any better, they'd think she was blushing. Clare was just happy that the ice queen Ada seemed to be had defrosted so effectively.

"Only problem is figuring out where he could be. We scoped out the whole city and who knows, maybe he's looking for us too."

She had a point. As far as any one of them knew, he had already passed through sections of the city just moments after they had fled from their fattening predators. Even with the extra back up from Jill, this meant an extra experimental bio-weapon ready to ruin their day along with the alpha blob who probably had Ada's name on top of its list of priority targets after her previous stunts and her botched attack against it.

"Now would be a good time to scope out the city for him." Clare thought aloud. "With the zombies cleaned up for the most part, as far as I can tell, only blobs should be left."

"And the monster chasing our new friend." Stated Ada. Jill turned her head to the side and coughed. Sherry, however, just stood by Clare's side, her little hand grasped against her fatty digits.

"Hey, with all this body fat we're kind of invincible, right?" Ada said to Sherry with a smile. "With all we've done so far, maybe all we need to do is knock over a few cars by belly slamming into them and we could all get out of here."

"Really?" The young girl asked enthusiastically, a bright glimmer of hope in her big eyes.

"Really." Ada assured her. Come hell or high water, she was making damn sure this kid had a future and one that would be worthwhile.

Jill sighed as she smiled up at the two, waddling forwards a bit. "I have a supplies kit that I could grab real quick before we go, with ammo and medicine stored in an atache case. Just wait outside and I'll meet you all there."

Ada and Clare nodded, the former picking Sherry up and letting her climb into the doughy, soft protection of her cleavage, Ada's boobs trembling and wobbling from side to side as the little blond girl wriggled her way inside their protection.

About twenty minutes later, as Ada and Clare nervously scanned the area while waiting, Jill waddled her way back out, carrying the silvery Atache case she talked about. Ada gulped nervously as she watched the woman's breasts bounce and her ass wobble and sway, feeling her heart beat a bit faster. Internally, she chalked it up to anxiety.

"Alright...our best bet is to scope the outer parameter of the city. By now, Leon would probably have tried to escape and make a way past all the wreckage and desolation." Jill analyzed as she slung the case over her meaty left shoulder with a black velcro sash.

"Sounds about right. Come on, let's hurry and find him!" Clare stated as she waddled forth before the other two smaller women eagerly. Ada moved slowly, looking down in her boobs to make sure Sherry was alright, noticing the little girl gently curled up between her bosom.

"...You seem to really like kids." Jill stated as she looked up at the puffy face of the Asian woman, who merely turned to her cooly.

"It wouldn't be right if I wasn't worried for her in this situation." Ada stated, a half-truth really. She was worried for Sherry out of conscience, but she had become more involved. She had taken time to talk with her and interact with her...she pitied the child, wondering what sort of life she would have once she was placed in an adoptive home. Or...maybe...

"Sssooo, uhh..." Jill was trying to ask something, but her tone was more casual, like she was trying to ask Ada a personal question. The massive Ms. Wong raised an eyebrow as she looked down at the vivacious Valentine, unable to keep her eyes from focusing on her bouncy bosom and butt as she waddled by her side

"You, uhh...wanna grab a coffee when this is over?" She asked, clearing her throat with a visible blush on her face, her dark, short hair casting a shade over her eyes. Maybe it was her heart beating or maybe it was the roaring fire all around her thanks to the city's desolation at the hands of a horde of the undead, brought back thanks to a poorly managed genetic experiment by a corrupt corporation, but something about being around Jill set a certain fire alight in her heart...
1232111112122211222222112211211212121221.title: Begruding Blob Women

She was rightfully worried about him but as Jill had stated the man was no fool he'd survive she just had to make sure she did as well...she could explain the tremendous weight gain later.

As she glanced over at Ada, Sherry resting comfortably in the woman's vast bosom, Claire was thankful their spat from earlier had reached a peaceful end. However being the only one of average weight Jill made a silent vow if things truly went south she'd be the one to get Sherry to safety. Ada and Claire would do anything to protect the child and so would she even if she had to carry the little girl in her arms instead of her breasts as Ada was now

The worker woman did as told as she slowly lifted herself upward to a standing position.

"So it's coming back to finish what it started. I tell you despite their size those things are crazy fast." complained the older "slimmer" woman.

"Regardless they must have some weakness..." with a bit of a sigh Claire continues, "I'm tired of running. Last time it caught me by surprise this time I want to finish it for good."

The woman smiles somewhat at younger Claire, "You know sweetie, you got a streak of determination a mile way. Well to me it looks like you're unarmed."

Claire states how the blob knocked away her pistol. "I see well somehow I doubt mere bullets would hurt the damn thing anyway..."

The sudden rumbling signals that the sugary monster is but a stone throws away from reaching the bakery.

"Go...leave this to me." commands Claire.

"Alright but you be careful, Hun." The woman then dashes toward the front door but before she exits she pauses one last time.

"If worse comes to worse...I'm sure you know exactly how you can "kill" it for good." she smiles slyly as does Claire before the woman exits and disappears into the streets.

'Let's hope it doesn't come down to that.' with a bit of a chuckle Claire prepares herself for the confrontation with the blob.

"Gah...what? I...I can't move..." grunted Claire as her body movement began to slow down drastically the blob now moving in closer.

'Damn it! Come on, move!' she screams within her head while staring down the monstrosity before her.

A tentacle then shots forward at Claire, but before the sugary limb can reach her a stream of flames seemingly from nowhere sail through the sky finally making contact with the tentacle.

The creature howls to a certain degree in pain. A confused Claire then spots the woman from before carrying with her of all things a flamethrower.

"I suppose it's a good thing I came back huh, sweetie."

"Uh..yeah." Claire responds with a mild chuckle.

Turning once again toward the sweet and sugary creature the woman unloads another round of flames the monster once more howling in pain before deciding to turn tail and run as fast as it could.

A duel sigh is heard from both women. "That was rather ingenious." states Claire who is finally starting to get feeling back in her body.

"Yeah it was wasn't it!" with a smile the woman goes on to explain how she got the weapon (hardware store) and how she planned to bring it back to Claire for use against the blobs.

"Well my job is done here. From this point on you're on your own. Be careful..." "Claire" "...Claire. I'm Rena and you be sure to give those damn things hell for me." states Rena with a bit of a smirk.

"Sure thing, and thank you. I'll definitely put this to good use." taking the flamethrower into her chubby hands Claire smiles as she and Rena parts ways yet again.

As she exits out the back Claire gives her new weapon a small pat a confident look on her chubby face.

Claire peeked her head out slowly just before turning the corner hoping there would be no sudden surprises waiting for her. While she knew that her new weapon would prove to be very valuable against any zombies or monster blobs she came across this town still had a knack for surprising even the most well prepared.

Continuing down the street, her hefty form jiggling as she did so, Claire noticed a particular trail of goo heading to and around the corner almost a block away.

Eyebrow raised walked up to the street staining substance. Now with a better look she concluded that it was the same trail belonging to that strange blob monster from earlier.

'Must have passed through here after Rena smoked it...'

Grabbing a hold of the flamethrower Claire sprinted, as best she could anyway, forward following the gooey trail...after a minute or two she came to a stop (breathing in and out slightly) and spotted the blob doing it's best to break into a candy store.

Rena's earlier act of heroism had obviously wounded the creature as it was struggling to break down a door that would have present no problem to it an hour or so ago.

"Found you."

The beast paused for a moment as it heard the young woman's voice. Slithering around the creature growled as it finally spotted Claire, flamethrower in hand.

"You don't like this thing do you?" the brunette teased as she allowed a small flame to peak outward. The monster blob yet again growled in anger.

In response Claire said nothing her tease-worthy expression now one of seriousness. Pointing her weapon at the blob Claire stood ready to take out the wounded monster before it had a chance to recover.

123211121.content:
Even though she continued to wave her fattening arms about Claire was quickly realizing that the longer the "kiss" from the blob went the shorter her air was getting, never mind the force fattening.

She screamed once more but just as before the sound was more muffled then an actual yell of agony...suddenly a gunshot rang out striking the blob. A few more rounds would then make impact with the strange monster and cause it to refocus on it's attacker rather then continue fattening Claire.

With it's hold finally broken Claire collapses to the street pavement, coughing and gagging the young woman being thoroughly exhausted from the whole ordeal.

"Get the hell away from her!" called out a rough male voice and while Claire was still "out of it" somewhere in the back part of her mind a ping went off and reminded her that she had in fact heard that man's voice before...

*BOOM*

Another gunshot went off but this one was obviously much stronger then before, so much so that the blob creature growled in what seem to be actual pain.

*BOOM*

Another shot and another growl. From her collapsed position on the ground Claire watched the monster growl a third time before oozing it's way back down into the sewers.

With the crisis avoided Claire was finally able to get a good look at her savor. Turns out it was blonde cop she had met before, Leon S. Kennedy she believed his name was. Leon with a look of concern ran up to her once he figured the coast was clear of any danger.

As he approached Claire caught sight of his surprised expression. She wasn't entirely sure if it was because he was actually surprised to see her again, if it was because of her sudden weight gain (which must be somewhere around 300 pounds or so), or maybe it was both reasons? She didn't know nor did Claire actually care right now she was just glad to be rescued from that...thing.

Almost instantly she took the hand offered to her by Leon. The young man was by no means a weakling but Claire was still able to make out a slight grunt leave his lips as he assisted her now hefty body off the ground, after all lifting up a 300 pound woman off the floor with a single hand was a pretty brave if not impulsive move to do.

So Claire decided to extend out one of her own arms to help out Leon, who instantly took it, and with his help the fatten young woman was finally back to her feet.

"Woah!" cried out Claire as she did her best to get used to her new size and stabilize her footing. Suddenly she felt a soft squeeze on both her shoulders. Leon had caught her just before she could accidentally tilt over and crash to the ground.

Once he was sure she was on good footing Leon released his hold on her, and luckily for Claire didn't notice the slight blush that had appeared on her new puffy cheeks.

"You okay?" he asked her straight-out causing Claire to blink in confusion for a moment.

"Uh...yeah...thanks, Leon. You saved my...butt...heh back there." glancing back at her much larger butt and hip region Claire could feel her blush returning but did her best to suppress it by changing the topic subject.

"Before anything else just how did you get that thing away from me?"

"A shotgun. At close range..." Leon paused as he lifted the gun of ground (he had placed it down momentarily to help up Claire), "a shot from these can take out damn near anything. Even that slimy creature that attacked you."

Claire nodded and mentally sighed as she felt her double chin wobble slightly. It's going to take months to rid herself of all this fat and even then she made still retain some of it she thought in frustration. But if there was one sliver lining it was that Leon didn't seem too affected by her new look.

'Maybe he just has a good poker face?' she wondered. Regardless she decided to tell him about her search for Sherry. Perhaps Leon had seen her somewhere?

Unfortunately it didn't work out that way but the young man was willing to help out Claire look for the young girl.

Thus began their search together.

Soon enough Claire's struggling has come to an end and the young woman stands enjoying the fattening effect the blob is having on her body, her face showcasing a lazy smile...

More and more she expands as time goes on. Claire's thighs swelling into redwood sized versions of themselves causing her black shorts to ride up her massive five-foot wide butt and hips, her belly growing ever larger eventually resting pass her fatten knees and sticking at least five perhaps six feet outward.

Claire's perky breasts have also grown far past any alphabetical cup size (her bra now in shreds) and give off the size of two extremely overinflated beach balls. Yet somehow her tightly-stretched shirt (now serving as more of a bra then an actual shirt) somehow still contains their fat-filled massiveness. Claire's arms are also fat-ridden, carrying at least fifty pounds of blubber on each one of them alone.

Though her face remains as cheerful as ever despite the fact that the brunette now has three chins, and perky cheeks.

At 1015 pounds, Claire is now a massive blob of her former self, all thanks to well having a huge blob within herself.

Claire giggled slightly causing her half-ton self to wobble for minutes on end as she playfully poked away at her new blubber. Amazingly, perhaps the immense sugar-rush had crumbled a bit of her sanity, Claire was not upset with being well blob-size.

Her sweet laughter echoed throughout the empty street as she finished poking around and instead opt to give her hefty belly a well deserved slap. Like a school girl she cooed and giggled at the ripple pouring out of her flab.

With a soft sigh and now that she had gotten that out of her system Claire took a look around, she smiled and was grateful when her state of amusement hadn't brought out any undead monsters or anymore blobs...come to think of it having a few more blobs poke out to see what the commotion was wouldn't have been so bad.

Silently Claire laughed at herself, was she actually going over the idea of getting even fatter then she was now? It was amazing she even liked herself at this size but to get even larger would be unheard of or would it?

Shrugging her large and soft shoulders Claire figured she should still look for Sherry. While the brunette was happy with her excess weight she wasn't sure the little blonde girl would be on top of that there were still undead walking about can't have Sherry get infected, she thought.

No longer did the young woman use her two legs to walk (not that her weight could allow such a thing), now parts of her doughy legs moved forward ahead of the rest of her body and started to pull the large girl forward, a start to how like the blob moved before it took shelter inside of Claire.

This, of course, horrified Claire but as much as she tried, she couldn't stop moving like that, losing the fight for control over her own body against a monster. But this was only the beginning of a new nightmare for her.

The movement stopped and Claire's body started to change again, this time her legs started to fuse together to create the same bottom half of the blob. The flesh from her lower half ripped through her shorts and undergarments. Soon, there was nothing but a shapeless mass of pink-colored skin that was once a woman's feet and legs. When that was complete, the half-girl, half-blob started moving again, this time it's shuffling was faster.

"Oh my god" thought Claire as she watched this event "How long do I have before I become just like this monster?!" She tried to stop moving again, but to no avail. To make matters worse, she was feeling sharp pains of hunger. "Ohhh...I can't take it anymore, where is some food?!"

Just then...

Just then the now transformed Claire spotted an abandoned food van a block or so ahead.

"What luck" mumbled Claire in delight while the rational part of her mind was still trying to fight off the blob "urges", it had taken her lower half but she'd be damned if her mind and upper body was altered without putting up a fight!

Regardless Claire soon found herself several inches from the tipped over van, there was no driver in the front seat nor any sign of a struggle thus Claire figured the driver must have escaped before it crashed into the corner light post.

With that in mind Claire sighed in content surely if the driver were still here he or she would freak at the sight of a literal blob girl. A ping of hunger came from her engorged stomach to remind her of why she had oozed on over toward the van in the first place.

Shuffling over toward the back of the damaged vehicle Claire noticed the set of doors were locked shut, she sighed yet again while still struggling to contain the blob's control over her.

Then an idea came to her Claire decided it was time to use the blob's "powers" rather then it use Claire. While still horrified over the whole transformation her body had gone through if she was now a freak forever then Claire was determined to tame her new half.

Concentrating she actually wield her massive stomach/blob-like lower half to pound away a few times at the door. It was difficult and Claire could feel the strain it was putting on her mentally as the beads of sweat poured out of her forehead but she still continued on.

She grunted, using her "gut" was a weapon was physically demanding after all, as the door finally parted opened slightly. Giving her blob half a rest Claire now wielded her human half to ooze down toward the opened doors. A brief smirk appeared on her plump lips as she found she could do just that. It seemed to her that she really was taking control of her new form.

With a slight push aside Claire opened the double doors revealing the numerous food crates and packages that were stated for delivery.

"Well they would spoil out here if left alone..." she muttered to herself before oozing forward a bit.

Unfortunately her new body shape was far too thick for the back of the truck and Claire let out a sharp grunt as she felt herself get stuck for a moment.

Her belly howled again as Claire thought things over, eyes shut began to ponder of a way to get to the food inside. After a moment she remembered how she leaned in and opened the doors!

"Of course!"

Backing off slightly Claire willed her human half forward and sneaked in while the majority of the blob portion of her body remained outside of van. She struggled slightly as a part of her stomach forced itself inside denting a bit of the structure in the process but it was worth it for Claire to be able to reach the crazes and packages of various food items.

As the minutes went by Claire continued to gorge on the total amount of food the van was carrying, growing ever larger with each new product put into her awaiting mouth...

Claire Redfield, the once 5'5", 115 pound girl was now a staggering 6'5", 3,000+ pound blob.

She didn't even feel any pain from sharp edges from shelves jabbing into a side of her.

The next change resulted in Claire no longer needing her mouth in order to feed herself. She could consume anything edible using any part of her body that touched the food in question, much like a blob would "eat" in science fiction movies. The sweat that used to cover her entire body and aid in her movement had turned into something almost like the icing that the blobs used for their movement, the last of the new changes. Little on the thin side though." said Claire hoping to find more food and fast. She left the store, spilling out of both the display window and the front door to carry out with her new mission.

12321122222112.content:
Claire only managed to shuffle halfway down the street, her new mass taking up the entire road and covering abandoned cars with her "slime", when she heard something behind her.

"Uhhhh.."

Claire shifted her head to see what is making that sound and saw a zombie coming out of a hardware store she just past, limping towards Claire. It's howl was followed by three more zombies, marching right behind the leader. They must have just been standing in the store when they saw Claire, the equal to several slow-moving buffets to them.

Claire thought about what to do with them. After all, she hadn't seen any zombies ever since her run-in with the blobs. Normally, she would have just outran them or shot them with her handgun. But now, she doesn't have a gun, much less arms to use one or legs to run away from them. She does however, now have a a body that can lift heavy objects.

When the first zombie was about to take a bite out of her "back", she put her body to good use. A tentacle extended out to grab the zombie and hold it up in the air by it's legs before doing the same with the other three zombies. She grunted with effort as she tossed three of them back into the hardware store. She stretched out her head to see if they would be getting back up and saw that they were now pinned down under a fallen shelf and wouldn't be getting back up.

Her attention now turned to the remaining zombie hoisted up in the air, pathetically clawing at Claire. She thought about giving it the same treatment as it's fellow walking dead, but then she winced from a large hunger pain. Claire knew she needed to eat and the only thing remotely edible was the zombie. She extended another tentacle to grab the zombie's jaw to keep it's mouth closed so it won't bite her and moved it to her body, intent on absorbing it for substance.

After all, she rationalized, the blobs had to be something made with the T-Virus. What more harm could one zombie do? Plus, she was a bit curious to what they tasted like.

After the deed was done, it turns out that they tasted awful.

"Bleah! I feel like throwing up! Never going to try that again" she said with a sour look on her face.

But then, she suffered through a short transformation. Her body turned into the same shade of yellow as the blobs, as well as becoming transparent. The clothes that the zombie was wearing before Claire ate and digested it could be seen floating inside her body. The finale began when Claire's hair started falling out in clumps as her head, the only thing left mostly untouched by all of the changes, sunk into the rest of herself. Before, it looked like just a human's head sitting on a big blob of fat. Now, the only thing that could lead people to recognize her, back when she was a human, is her face which could stretch out or even be moved from one spot of her body to another with a single thought.

The rest of Claire's path down the street was uneventful, spitting out the consumed zombie's clothes out of her body while moving, until she turned left into a dead end with a diner as the only thing standing.

Which was perfect for Claire as she wanted to eat something to get rid of the taste of that zombie. The doors were wide open so that saved her the trouble to smash them down with her bulk. However, she was far too big to fit all of her body inside the diner so she resorted to only sending a part of her inside. But whatever was left, Claire helped herself to, sticking out tendrils to grab anything. A half-eaten hamburger here, a melted bowl of ice cream there, all of it was snatched up and sucked into her body where it was instantly digested. She was a bit shocked that her handgun didn't even give this monster that came out of nowhere a scratch as well as seeing that it had the face of a barely recognizable human girl.

Though I guess I made..a couple of changes last time I saw him. Changes for the better, I think." purred Claire, feeling a bit of pleasure as she thought about all of the transformations she had been subject to.

Ada's jaw dropped at the idea of anyone thinking that turning into something like THAT could be enjoyable and said so. "Better?! Look at yourself! All I see is just a big fat freak's neck!" shouted Ada.

That proved to be a mistake as Claire quivered with rage.

"Freak?! A skinny little thing like you wouldn't understand what it's like to be something fantastic like this! But..maybe I'll show you!" roared Claire as she lunged at Ada while more of her 3,000 pound self squeezed inside the diner to try to cut Ada off from any escape routes.

12321122222112211.content:
Note: Sorry for not making a real update but I wanted to provide all of the stages Claire went through as options, but since I'm limited to making two choices, I'm improvising. I'm not a fan of adding on to the story with just choices but this way, someone else can write their own take whenever they want to start.

To sum up, here are the stages that Claire underwent, though she can keep changing with the right stimulus (i.e. when a writer feels like it.) It's also up to whoever wants to pick this up if Ada retains her full mental functions or if her mind was altered into a simple feeding frenzy or to enjoy being transformed like that or do something different.

Stage 1: After the initial fattening, the victim's lower half changes to become one lump of flesh. Since the legs are gone, locomotion is made possible by dragging themselves across the ground. The rest of the body is left perfectly human aside from the extra weight.

Stage 2: The upper body of the victim changes to match the lower body, losing the use of their arms. The neck is also lost and the face grows a bit wider. As manipulating objects the way a human would, it becomes second nature (or it is quickly learned) for the victim to stretch out parts of their own body to grab objects. The subject also starts sweating constantly to the point where they are always coated with it and it is intended to provide lubrication for movement. It is unknown if it can cause other people to become infected upon ingestion.

Stage 3: The changes are not as grand as the previous two stages, but the victim no longer is restricted to ingesting food through their mouths, able to take any organic material and consume it at will if any part of their body touches said material. Digestion usually occurs instantly. The other change is the sweat that Phase 2 subjects emit changes to the sweet smelling and tasting slime a complete blob (usually the ones that infect the victim in the first place) secrete. If the new Phase 3 subject tries tasting the slime, they do not suffer any ill effects but as with the Phase 2 sweat, it is unknown if pure humans will be affected by it. The rest of the body is left unchanged.

And lastly, stage 4: The subject suffers rapid hair loss as their heads lose the shape and bone structure of a human, opting to become one with the rest of the blob. The eyes, nose and mouth can be moved all over the body at a single thought (an example would be one eye at the back of the subject and one at the front.) Also, the body changes color to become the same yellow color as the complete blobs while becoming transparent, allowing anyone to see the contents inside the subject before they are digested. Despite the lack of any human organs, the subject is able to experience the same feelings, senses and thoughts as they did before the infection started.


Again, sorry for pausing the story but it never hurts to get more than just two options.

So anyway, what stage did Ada reach when it was all said and done?

I could do NOTHING to stop him...." His eyes clouded over, and he broke into quiet sobs, tears falling onto the linoleum floor like pure drops of sorrow-filled rain. The rifle fell, clattering deafeningly in the near-silence, but not even drawing an iota of attention. Claire's eyes blurred, she put her pudgy hands up to her face, and felt tears streaming down her face. Just from his small, truthful tale, her heart had broken for him. Thiel himself sat there, stunned by the word from the pilot who had ripped open a licker's head with his bare hands. But then, something unexpected happened. Claire stood up, albeit shakily, then waddled over toward the hunched form of Cirrus, and engulfed him in an enormous hug, holding his face in her cleavage. Thiel, still stunned, felt his jaw drop when he saw this.

"Claire! What are you doing? We hardly know 'em and yet... you're giving him a hug? What's with that?" Thiel half-shouted, half-asked. Claire looked at him woefully, then motioned toward Cirrus, who had gripped her form tightly, tears of depression dripping on her clothes.

"i will kill them all...."

"Huh?" Claire asked.

"I will kill them all... all Umbrella Corporation's employees, monsters, EVERYTHING. They took from me my family, and now....I'LL ERASE THEM FROM HISTORY." On that note, he removed himself with a slight bow and strode over to the stairs, where he proceeded to walk up to the second floor.

Claire's fat belly shook as she sat down again, breaking a bit of the floor with her enormous mass. She rubbed her eyes, then looked at Thiel.
1232122212212111121121211.title: Claire asks what he means by his last sentence.

choices: The robot automatically targets Claire and Thiel as enemies.

12321222122121111211212111.content:
"Thiel, I'm tired. And I'm sure you are too. Why don't we get some sleep? It'll give us energy and we can stock up on weapons and ammunition tomorrow. How about it?"

"Well...I was hoping to search around..." Thiel said, before almost flying into the air from a massive nosebleed. Claire was lying on her side, motioning for Thiel to snuggle next to her. The seduction worked, and Thiel rubbed right underneath Claire's enormous breasts, snuggling into her massive belly. Claire bent over as best as she could, and kissed Thiel's cheek, which immediately turned cherry red from embarrassment.

"Good night Thiel," Claire said, before laying her head down on an oddly comfortable sandbag.

"Good night, Claire..." He had fallen asleep ten seconds before Claire said that, and was sleeptalking as he clutched at her belly fat. Everything was silent as the two fell into dreamland, looks of peace upon their faces.
- - - - - - - - -
"Okay, rewire the power-cube and wire-clutch to the top rotating platform, to give more of a speed turn...then connect it to the lower half. Set up the treads and line up the carpal-phalanges trigger pull, switch to remote mode...ah! There we go..." It was Cirrus's voice again, this time though, much nearer. Thiel looked up to see that the lights were off, and it was morning. He saw Cirrus sitting on a makeshift bench, sparks flying from a metal container.

"What are you doing?" Thiel moved slowly, trying not to wake the still sleeping Claire.

"Huh?" Cirrus grunted, looking at Thiel as if he had intruded on "his" time. "Oh, I 'm building a machine drone, equipped with a minigun I found, along with smoke launchers, to aid us. Claire is a little slow, in speed, and she'll need more protection than just you. You're not that intimidating, so I built this little guy to combat entire ARMIES of zombies and demonic things to protect our small squad. Like it?" He turned and revealed a suitcase-sized miniature tank-like robot complete with a GIGANTIC minigun attached to the turret. A single, Veritech-like head was the main sensor.

"Wow..."
12321222122121111211212111.title: The Odd Robot

choices: An hour later, after Claire wakes up...
